name: Acolyte of Nature
description:
Learn one of the following Druid cantrips: Poison Spray, Produce Flame, Shillelagh, Thorn Whip.

Get one of the following proficiencies: Animal Handling, Nature, Survival.

name: Actor
description: You have become a true thespian. Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20bug. Your ProficiencyBonus is doubled for Deception and Performance Checks.

name: Alert
description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

name: Athlete: Standing Up
description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

name: Bestial Fury
description: Grants all your companions an extra attack.

name: Blessed Healer
description:
Healing others heals you as well.

When you cast a healing spell of Level 1 or higher on another creature, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

name: Blessings of Knowledge
description: Gain Expertise in two of the following Skills: Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion. Your Proficiency Bonus is doubled for Ability Checks made using these Skills.

name: Colossus Slayer
description: Once per turn, your weapon attack deals an extra 1d8|Physical|drs=t damage if the target is below its hit point maximum.

name: Companion's Bond
description: Your Summoned Companions receive a bonus to Armour Class, damage, and Attack Rolls (even though this is not stated) equal to your ProficiencyBonus.

name: Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank
description: When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

name: Crossbow Expert: Wounding
description: Your Piercing Shot inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

name: Dark One's Blessing
description: Whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 Hit Points, this gift from your patron grants you Charisma Modifier + Warlock Level temporary hit points.

name: Dark One's Own Luck
description: Call on your patron to change your fate and add a {{DieIcon|d10|Physical1d10}} to an  Ability Check.

name: Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to m=12.

name: Disciple of Life
description: Your devotion empowers your healing Spells. When casting a healing spell, the target regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

name: Divine Health
description: The divine magic flowing within you prevents disease from affecting you.

name: Dread Ambusher
description:
You specialise in taking out foes swiftly and ruthlessly.

You gain a +3 bonus to Initiative.

On the first turn of combat, your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10, and you can also make an extra weapon attack that deals an additional d8|Physical1d8 damage

name: Dual Wielder
description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

name: Durable
description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

name: Escape the Horde
description: Opportunity Attacks against you have Disadvantage.

name: Exceptional Training
description: Your summoned companions can now Dash, Disengage, and Help as a bonus.

name:
Extra Attack Code|This information can be found in the definition of ExtraAttackSpellCheck() in Game/scripts/thoth/CommonConditions.khn obtained from unpacking Game.pak. (See Modding:Unpacking_and_converting_files).}}
*** Commander's Strikename=Extra Attack Code|
*** Bufotoxinname=Extra Attack Code|
*** Smokepowder Arrowname=Extra Attack Code|
** Once Extra Attack is triggered all affected attacks will glow white and the action point will be removed from their cost. Other resources like bonus actions or class resources will stay.
* Additional instances of Extra Attack do not stack; a multiclassed Ranger and Fighter with 5+ Levels in each will still only have 1 Extra Attack.
** Deepened Pact (Pact of the Blade (passive feature))'s Extra Attack does stack, but not in Honour mode.
** Level 11 Fighters gain an improved version of this ability, allowing for 2 Extra Attacks per trigger.
* Some other Classes have their own version of Extra Attack;
** Pact of the Blade or Chain Warlock's Deepened Pact at level 5.
** Druid's Wild Strike and Improved Wild Strike at Level 5 and 10.
** Beast Master Ranger's Bestial Fury at level 11.
* An attack made with the action gained from Action Surge can trigger Extra Attack, regardless of difficulty.
=== Non-Honour mode ===
The notes below are changed to specifically not work in the Honour mode difficulty. They still work in Explorer, Balanced and Tactician:
* Warlock's Pact of the Blade Deepened Pact: Extra Attack does stack with other sources.
* Sources of additional Action Icon Actions like Hastened and Elixir of Bloodlust can also have Extra Attack apply. Only Action Surge works in honour mode.
** For example, a Hastened Level 11 Fighter with Elixir of Bloodlust on Tactician difficulty or below could attack 6 times, then an additional 3 times if they got a kill that round.
description: You can make an additional free attack after making an unarmed or weapon attack.

name: Great Weapon Master: All In
description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are proficient with, Attack rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

name: Heavily Armoured
description: You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

name: Heavy Armour Master
description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

name: Horde Breaker
description: Target two creatures standing close to each other, attacking them in quick succession.

name: Indomitable
description: Whenever you fail a Saving Throw, you can roll again, using the new result instead.

name: Iron Mind
description: You gain Proficiency in Wisdom and Intelligence SavingThrows.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add half of your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down) to Ability Checks that you are not Proficient in.

name: Land's Stride: Difficult Terrain
description: Difficult Terrain no longer slows you down.

name: Lightly Armoured
description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

name: Lucky
description: You gain 3 lps, which you can use to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, or Saving Throws, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Rolls.

name: Mage Slayer: Attack Caster
description: When a creature casts a spell within melee range of you, you can use a reaction to immediately make an attack against the caster.

name: Mage Slayer: Break Concentration
description: Enemies you hit have Disadvantage on Concentration Saving Throws.notes

name: Mage Slayer: Saving Throw Advantage
description: When a creature casts a spell within melee range of you, you have Advantage on any Saving Throws against it.

name: Magic Initiate: Bard
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list.

name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list.

name: Magic Initiate: Druid
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list.

name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list.

name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list.

name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
description: You have learnt 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list.

name: Martial Adept
description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

name: Medium Armour Master
description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armour to take this feat

name: Metamagic: Careful Spell
description: Allies automatically succeed Saving Throws against spells that required them.

name: Metamagic: Distant Spell
description: Increases the range of the spell by 50%. Melee Range IconMelee spells are increased to m=9|ft=30.

name: Metamagic: Extended Spell
description: Double the duration of Conditions, summons, and surfaces caused by spells.

name: Metamagic: Heightened Spell
description: Targets of spells that require Saving Throws have Disadvantage on their first Saving Throw.

name: Metamagic: Quickened Spell
description: Spells that take an action take a bonus instead.

name: Metamagic: Subtle Spell
description: You can cast spells while Silenced.

name: Metamagic: Twinned Spell
description:
Spells that only target 1 creature can target an additional creature.

Costs 1 sp|1 per Spell Slot level used. Cantrips also cost 1 sp|1.

name: Mobile
description: Your movement speed increases by 3m.

name: Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain
description: When you Dash, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

name: Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack
description: If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

name: Moderately Armoured
description: You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

name: Multiattack Defence
description: When a enemy attacks you, they suffer -4 penalty to additional Attack Rolls against you until start of their next turn.

name: Nature's Ward
description: You can't be Charmed or Frightened by elementals and fey. Disease and poison also no longer affect you.

name: Pact of the Blade
description: You can Summon a pact weapon, or Bind the one you are wielding as one, making it magical.
image: Pact of the Blade Passive Feature.webp

name: Pact of the Chain
description: Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes a form of your choosing. This can be an animal, imp, or quasit.

name: Pact of the Tome
description: Your patron grants you a grimoire called "The Book of Shadows", which allows you to cast Guidance, Vicious Mockery, and Thorn Whip.

name:
Pikes|It's not stated in-game but Polearm Mastery works with Pikes too. Polearm Master is coded to work with any weapon that is tagged as a SPEAR or STAVE (quarterstaffs), and weapons with Extra Reach (Glaives, Halberds and Pikes)}} Quarterstaves|alias=Quarterstaff, or Spears|alias=Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee bug
description:
When attacking with a Glaives|alias=Glaive, Halberds|alias=Halberd, Pikes|alias=Pike Quarterstaves|alias=Quarterstaff, or Spears|alias=Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee bug

name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
description: When wielding a glaive, halberd, quarterstaff, or spear, you can make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

name: Potent Spellcasting
description:
Your god grants you even more intense power.

You can add your Wisdom Modifier to the damage you deal with Cleric cantrips.

name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
description:
You learn two  Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

name: Savage Attacker
description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

name: Sentinel: Snare
description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

name: Sentinel: Vengeance
description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

name: Sharpshooter: All In
description: Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

name: Shield Master
description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

name: Spell Sniper
description: You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

name: Stalker's Flurry
description: When you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another one for free.

name: Steel Will
description: Advantage on SavingThrows against being Frightened.

name: Superior Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to 24 m / 80 ft.

name: Tavern Brawler
description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

name: Tempestuous Magic
description: After you cast a Level 1 Spell or higher you can Fly as a Bonus Action up to m=9 until the end of your turn without receiving Opportunity Attacks.

name: Tough
description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

name: War Caster: Concentration
description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

name: Weapon Master
description:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.
